ar: هَلْ أُنَبِّئُكُمْ عَلَىٰ مَن تَنَزَّلُ ٱلشَّيَـٰطِينُ
en: Shall I inform you upon whom the devils descend?
They descend upon every sinful liar.
They pass on what is heard,
and most of them are liars.

ar: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّهُمْ فِى كُلِّ وَادٍ يَهِيمُونَ
en: Do you not see that in every valley they roam
And that they say what they do not do? -
Except those [poets] who believe and do righteous deeds
and defend [the Muslims] after they were wronged.
And those who have wronged are going to know
And those who have wronged are going to know
to what [kind of] return they will be returned.
